label: 表白
本: Jewel in the Ashes: Buddha Relics and Power in Early Medieval Japan . Harvard University Asia Center . 2000
見出し読み: ひょうひゃく, ひょうはく, ひょうびゃく
見出し読み_mod: ひょうひゃく, ひょうはく, ひょうびゃく
説明文: Hyōhyaku (J.) 表白, also pronounced hyōhaku or hyōbyaku, sometimes referred to as 啓白keibyaku. Opening pronouncement at an assembly or rite which states its meaning and/or the prayer for which it has its basis.
